mapper.update: update sys_menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iconcls = #{iconcls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request = #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expand = #{expand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, leaf = #{leaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, menu_name, menu_type, parent_id, iconcls, request, expand, sortno, leaf, remark from sys_menu where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, menu_name, menu_type, parent_id, iconcls, request, expand, sortno, leaf, remark from sys_menu
